bio: Komajiro is dressed like a naughty li’l devil! He’s taking a break from DJ-ing to make sure other Yo-kai don’t have too much Halloween fun.

soultimate.name: Wild Zaps
soultimate.description: Lightning strikes to deal foes lots of damage.

skill.effect: Defense up by 210% when below 25% HP.
skill.name: Hang in There

name: Li'l Devil Komajiro
